description: This file contains CSS styles for the App component, including theme variables for light and dark modes, as well as styles for various class elements within the app.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling, applying overall theme colors and layout.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo including animation properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the application's header, including responsive layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for the links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the button to toggle between light and dark themes.
